headline: Assessing Wells Fargo’s (WFC) Valuation After Series BB Preferred Share Redemption Plan
summary: What Wells Fargo’s Series BB preferred redemption means for stock investors Wells Fargo (WFC) plans to redeem all 140,400 outstanding Series BB preferred shares on March 16, 2026, a capital move that removes this 3.90% issue from its capital structure after regulatory clearance. See our latest analysis for Wells Fargo. For common shareholders, the Series BB preferred redemption sits alongside a busy few weeks that include new senior unsecured bond offerings, fresh preferred dividends and a...
